maqras.text: Bak Musa yoh nyan Kamoe kheun bagah Bak watee malam tateubiet sigra Bandum ngon hamba Lon nyang meutuah Gata nyoe bandum jilet di likot
Keubit jiseutot Peuraʻeun jadah Bansaboh nanggroe jikrah dum rakyat
Awak nyan meuhat sit nit sileupah
Jimeung peubeungeh bandum geutanyoe
Tajaga jih nyoe beu got that leupah
Kamoe peuteubiet treuk bandum jih nyan Tinggai treuk taman jih dum nyang luah Tinggai mata ie teumpat jimanoe
Geudong meuasoe bandum jikeubah Tinggai dum pangkat jih nyang mulia
Bandum pusaka tinggai le leupah Kamoe bri bandum keu cot Israil
Dijih peureugi jiseutot bagah Ka teubiet uroe keudeh jiseutot
‘Oh ban meusapat jieu ka leumah Geukheun dum yoh nyan le rakan Musa Musoh ka teuka jehpat le leupah Tanyoe jiteumee han jipeulheueh le
Musa geukheun le bek sosah-sosah Tuhan lon sajan Neutunyok keu lon À Sit Neubri jalan tanyoe Neupeuglah
Kamoe bri wahyu teuma bak Musa Nyan tungkat gata tapoh ie bagah Tapoh ie laot ngon tungkat gata Teuhah le sigra jalan dum luah Sang gunong raya dum dalam laot Meuikot-ikot gata meung bagah
Awak nyang seutot teuma di likot Kamoe peuikot ka toe that leupah
Kamoe peuleupah Musa ngon rakan
Laen dum karam lam laot luah
Bandum atra nyan sit jeuet keu tanda Allah Taʻala kuasa leupah < Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Dijih bandum nyan hana phaedah>
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
Teuma tapeugah lom bak awak nyan Haba Ibrahim ureueng meutuah
Geukheun bak ayahgeuh ngon bak kaom d Geuh gata bandum peue nyan taseumah
Jikheun dum kamoe meuseumah patong Beurhala bandum han kamoe keubah
Geukheun boh na deuh jideungo gata Watee tabaca peue tameung peugah
Ek jibri le jih peue nyang munapheu“ʻat í Got pih meularat teuh ek jipeuglah
Jikheun dum kamoe meu-eu yah kamoe Bandum atra nyoe dilee geuseumah A
Geukheun taeukeuh nyang taseumah nyan
Le gata dum nyan ngon ayah-ayah Ngon yah-yah gata dum nyang ka dilee
Bandum nyan sitree lon musoh leupah 1 Meulengkan Tuhan nyang Po alam nyoe
Nyang peujeuet lon nyoe phon manyak leupah Neubri peutunyok keu lon ‘oh lheueh nyan
Neubri makanan ngon ie puleh grah
Watee saket lon Neupeupuleh le
Lon Neupeumate pih han soe teugah Neupeuudep lon lom ‘oh Iheueh mate
Neuampon sabe watee lon salah Meunapsu lon that Neuampon dacha Jan haro hara watee Neubalah Uroe kiamat haro hara that
Neubri hikmat keu lon ya Allah € Neupeusapat lon ngon ureueng shaleh
Neupeujroh leubeh nan lon gop peugah Bak ureueng dudoe nan lon beu beuna
Neubri pusaka churuga indah Churuga nikmat lon tueng pusaka Neubri keu hamba wahe ya Allah
Lom Neupeuampon dacha ayah lon Sabab ayah lon sisat ka salah
Lom pih ulon nyoe bek Neubri ‘ayeb Uroe geubangket malee lon leupah
Atra ngon aneuk hana guna le ‘Oh uroe page ka teuka sudah
Meulengkan soe-soe nyang jak bak Tuhan Ate jih iman nyang gleh sileupah
Teuma geupeutoe keunan churuga Bak ureueng takwa iman keu Allah
Diureueng sisat leumah nuraka
Geutanyong sigra ho ka tuhankah Peue nyang ka seumah nyang bukan Tuhan
Ho ka dum jih nyan kacuba peugah ž Na jitulong kah atawa droejih
Geulungkop dum jih lam apui mirah Awak nyang sisat meusapat ngon jih
Lom tentra Iblih sinan geukeubah Sipai Iblih bandum di sinan
Meudawa yoh nyan meuplah-plah babah
Deumi nyo Tuhan kamoe nyoe sisat
Gata dum meuhat kamoe jak seumah Sabab meupeusa gata ngon Tuhan Nyang Po dum alam nyang Maha Murah
Kon ureueng laen peusisat kamoe Nyoekeuh awak nyoe nyang peubuet salah
Hana chupeuʻat le soe keu kamoe
Rakan dum nyang toe pih tan le leumah
Adak meu geutem geupeuwoe kamoe Meuiman kamoe jinoe le bagah
Bandum atra nyan cit jeuet keu tanda Allah Taʻala Kuasa leupah Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Keu jih bandum nyan hana phaedah
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
Kaom Noh jikheun sulet dum Rasul Han jitem kaboe watee Noh peugah
Chedara jih Noh geukheun bak jih nyan Pakon gata han takwa keu Allah
Lon nyoe bit Rasul jeuet tapeucaya
Teuma takwa gata keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
Hana bak gata lon lakee upah Bak Po dum alam upah lon ka na
Teuma takwa gata keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
